name: Mistwetter
body: # Mistwetter ##Synopsis An Android app to display the current weather forecast. Including hourly forecast and a 7 day forecast. It is a beta version. Information the app displays: * temperatur (current, hourly, 7 day forecast) * location (at the moment hard coded position) * time (current) * humidity (current) * wind speed (current) * preciptation (current) * pressure (current) * summary (7 day forecast) Forecast information are from forecast.io using the si-units. ##Tested on following devices Samsung Galaxy S2 - 4.1.1 - API 16 HTC One - 4.4.4 - API 19 ##API Reference using: Butterknife ##Screenshots:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
